actions: Softens the Liver and relieves pain.
Promotes the movement of Spleen and Stomach Qi, harmonizes the Middle Jiao, relieves intestinal gas, improves Lung function, expands the chest and relieves Cold induced wheezing.
With Jie Geng, for common colds with nasal congestion and productive cough.
Moistens the Lungs, relieves cough, clears the voice, comforts the Liver and regulates the Qi.
Promotes movement of Qi and alleviates pain.
Regulates Qi, adjusts the Middle, relieves the diaphragm and descends Qi.
With Sheng Jiang, for vomiting and hiccups due to Disharmony of the Stomach Qi.
Opens the Lungs, spreads Lung Qi, expels Phlegm, benefits the throat, expels pus and opens and raises Lung Qi, directing the effects of other herbs to the upper body.
Warms the Lungs, stops cough and reduces the toxicity of other herbs.
Moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.
With Sheng Jiang, prevents Phlegm accumulation.

syndromes: Laryngitis due to Liver Qi Stagnation

symptoms: Sudden loss of voice brought on by depression, anger worry, emotional turmoil or sudden upset
Distention and pain in the sides or flanks
Breast distention and pain before and during menses
manifestations.tongue: Pink or Dark (Red edges with Heat)

modifications.purpose: dispersing Stagnation and nourishing the Heart
stagnant Lung Qi with Phlegm in the chest
Heart Deficiency with insomnia and much dreaming
